title: dhAri theliyaka
sahitya:
dAri teliyaka vaccinAvEmO dAni mAyalO cikkina nIvu

anupallavi

verE kAraNamEmi yunnadi shrI venkaTEshvara cAla mElAya

cittaswara saahitya

alacilu kala kuluki kulukulADi mikulamODi galakayALi 
palukaTa jOligaladi nIku sariyaina jatajEri nadigA manasu 
karagu naTula kulukucu paliki cekkina ginna peTTi tiTTu 
nenaru kalagucunna valapu paikamula paigala dAni viDici

caraNa swara saahitya

1

AvagalADi valalOtagilina nI nerajANatana bETikika

2

Adaramuga ninu rArAyani piluvadu rAjasalugaladirA
taginaharAmi atitarA taramerugatarA manasu rAyirA ika teluka

3

nilavaramaku valapu colapu nilipi kalumula nosagagala 
viTula kalayuTaku talapu galadi 

4

IlATi celimi jEyuTaku manaseTu kalikerA nirparAdhayagu ninu nirAkArinci 
kinutO nanu dUritivadi nIku neratanamA doratanamA celimikamATa mAdelapumu 
nI manasuna kalamarmarmamulanu telusu koNTi marikadalu viNTi sariyaniyuNTi nacaTa
